Text: How can episode 5 be available when it hasn't been on air yet?  It seems this whole Lost series is off by one, at least according to IMDB.  They say episode 5 will be on air 3/2.  Is this really episode 4, the Lighthouse?  Aired 2/23?
That's weird, maybe they are considering the first 2 parter episode as 1 episode? But yes, this is the "Lighthouse" that aired 2/23. ;)
